form.description: Operational guidance, data reference, and troubleshooting for the Halcyon.ai for Splunk App.

html.p: The Halcyon.ai for Splunk App provides centralized, scalable visibility into ransomware prevention, detection, response, and platform health data collected from the Halcyon.ai API.
This app is designed for enterprise-scale operations where direct use of the Halcyon UI does not scale across large security, IT, or executive audiences.

html.p: This app enables centralized visibility without requiring thousands of users to be provisioned directly in Halcyon.ai.

ul.li: Splunk RBAC controls access to dashboards and data
Halcyon roles are preserved for reporting and auditing
No CSV or PDF exports required for executive consumption
Verify API token validity in Setup
Confirm inputs are enabled and polling as expected
Check Splunk internal logs for API or parsing errors
